alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 10:01PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Weld County through 1045 PM MDT... At 1000 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southeastern Greeley, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greeley, Evans, Eaton, Severance, LaSalle, Ault, Kersey, Pierce and Lucerne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County
